title: STEM Language Integration Instructional Design Utilizing Collaborative Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of foundational STEM concepts and experience with collaborative learning
context.additional_context: Process for in-service elementary teachers to learn designing CPS-based STEM activities in language education contexts. Environment enabling resource sharing and collaboration via BYOD

learning_goals: Learners can propose integrated technical application plans, including task regulation strategies, when designing CPS-based STEM problems.
Learners can develop and implement STEM language-integrated educational scenarios in small team environments.
Learners can analyze and improve conflict management strategies arising during collaborative problem-solving processes via project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
